item.title: seminars and talks
item.description: seminars and invited talks Unbiased Mixed Variables Distances - IFCS 2024: 18th conference of the International Federation of Classification Societies (2024 - San Jose, Costa Rica) Convex Clustering of Mixed Numerical and Categorical Data - SIS 2024: The 52nd Scientific Meeting of the Italian Statistical Society (2024 - Bari, Italy) Convex Clustering of Mixed Numerical and Categorical Data - Workshop on “Statistical Computing and Robust Inference for High Dimensional Data” (2023 - Taipei, Taiwan)
